content.prompt_es: Choose the correct word to fill in the gaps in the text below.
content.main_text: In the realm of literary criticism, the (1)___ of a text is paramount. Critics often (2)___ various elements such as structure, style, and thematic concerns to uncover deeper meanings. The (3)___ approach allows for a nuanced understanding of the author's intent and the audience's reception. Furthermore, an effective analysis must consider the (4)___ context, as it shapes the interpretation of the work. Ultimately, the goal is to (5)___ the text in a way that reveals its complexities and contradictions.
content.explanation:
(1) La deconstrucción es un método crítico que implica analizar el texto en profundidad.
(2) Interpretar implica examinar los diferentes elementos de un texto para encontrar significados.
(3) Un enfoque crítico es esencial para entender las intenciones del autor y las reacciones de la audiencia.
(4) El contexto cultural influye en cómo se interpreta un texto.
(5) Analizar un texto significa descomponerlo para entender sus complejidades.
